name: Bouba-Kiki
description:
~

Match shapes to make tunes.

How to launch:

  • Download the APK file on this page to your Android device (you may get a warning for harmful files, click ok). Or you can alternatively download it onto your computer and transfer it to your Android device.
  • Find the APK in your file explorer, and tap to install (click install anyway if Play Protect blocks the install).
  • You can find the icon in your app list once it's installed, and open it from there.

Controls: one finger taps

~

Development time: two days
